      "    year  month  total_sales_count\n",

      "2   2024     12               2283\n",
      "3   2025      1               3830\n",
      "4   2025      2               1924\n",
      "5   2025      3               1696\n",
      "6   2025      4               1694\n",
      "7   2025      5               1129\n",
      "8   2025      6               2009\n",
      "9   2025      7               2056\n",
      "10  2025      8               2050\n",
      "11  2025      9               2313\n",
      "12  2025     10               2220\n",
      "13  2025     11               2259\n",
      "14  2025     12               2283\n",
      "15  2026      1               3830\n",
      "16  2026      2               1924\n",
      "17  2026      3               1696\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "monthly_sales_count = df.groupby(['year', 'month']).agg(total_sales_count=('predicted_sales', 'sum')).reset_index()\n",
    "\n",
    "# Display the monthly total sales count\n",
    "print(monthly_sales_count)"
   ]
  },

   "id": "672bd8c8-243a-41df-a687-c611fc7a3964",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import pandas as pd\n",
    "df = pd.read_excel( 'predicted_yearly_plan_sales 11.xlsx')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "id": "63997368-c5f9-49bc-b484-d84c04ee68f3",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "   year  total_sales_count\n",
      "0  2024               6762\n",
      "1  2025              25463\n",
      "2  2026               7450\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "monthly_sales_count = df.groupby(['year']).agg(total_sales_count=('predicted_sales', 'sum')).reset_index()\n",
    "\n",
    "# Display the monthly total sales count\n",
    "print(monthly_sales_count)"
   ]
  },
